Standing in the doorway was the body of our 24 year old neighbor, Kevin Green. He had recently moved in next door after graduating from the local university and was renting the house next door with the help of his girlfriend and a friend.

I ran up to my mom and gave her a giant hug. "We were so worried about you" I said.

"I bet. I was worried about you and your sister"

No sooner had she said that I heard Claire come downstairs and shout "MOM" before running over and joining our hug.

Once we all broke the hug mom asked me who's body I was in, which I answered prior to introducing mom to Willow. After introductions, Willow said that she should be headed home to check on her aunt and uncle and make sure they were ok. However, my mom insisted that it was much to unsafe to be traveling anywhere right now and that she should just call to find out if they were all right but stay here until it was safer. Willow gratefully accepted my mom's offer and stepped outside to make a call.

Meanwhile, I sat in the living room with my mom and Claire as we watched the local news giving the same reports that they were when I was still at school. However, I found myself constantly looking outside at Willow who had a concerned look on her face. I kept getting this feeling in the pit of my stomach telling me that something was wrong so I headed outside to join her. "Everything alright?" I asked.

Willow was silent for a moment, deep in thought, before replying. "No. Nobody answered"

"Bummer" I said as I took a seat next to her. The two of us sat in an awkward silence for a moment until I spoke up again. "I didn't know you lived with your aunt and uncle"

"Yeah, I have for a while now"

"Do you mind me asking why?"

Willow was deep in thought as memories ran through her head. "I don't wanna talk about it" she said before heading inside. I stayed outside for a minute to give her some space before I re-entered the house and joined my mom and sister in watching the news.

After a while the 4 of us decided that we weren't going to get anything from the news and tried to find something we could all enjoy watching. Around noon, mom went to the kitchen to make some sandwiches for everyone while we tried to pass the time. Willow was glued to her phone, hoping that someone somewhere would figure out a way to get everyone to their rightful bodies. She was still glued to it even after I told her that if anyone could figure some way to reverse this it would probably take months or years.

After I had finished eating I went to the kitchen to get a drink, followed closely by Claire. "What's with Willow?" She asked.

"What do you mean?" I replied.

"Well, she seems, I don't know, off?"

"Well, randomly switching bodies with a guy will do that to you"

"Yeah, I get that. It's just..."

"She just needs time" I interrupted, before heading back to the living room with a glass of water.

As I sat back down in the living room, I couldn’t help but let what Claire said creep into my mind. What was it really bothering Willow. It felt like ever since she couldn’t get in touch with her aunt and uncle she hadn’t been the same. ‘Oh well’ I thought to myself. ‘When she’s ready to talk about it I’m sure she’ll tell someone’

First, you need to pick out a pair of shoes from this store that you will wear. I won't have it be anything specific. I'll tell you step number two after you finish step one." I didn't say anything because I could tell she was totally serious.

I walked away and started looking for something I could stand wearing. This store didn't have much that fit my criteria, which was no heel and not super girly. I eventually found a pair of boots that kind of fit that ( http://m.gojane.com/89961-shoes-so-studl... ), so I tried them on. They went just past my ankles, and were kind of comfy so I put them in the box, and brought them over to Megan. "Here" I said as I opened the box showing them to her. "Now what's part two to leave?"

"Well" she said. "You are going to need to learn how to walk in heels at some point, so why not do it now. I'm going to teach you how to walk in heels and then we are each going to get a pair." Knowing that this was my only way back to the house, I went with her as she lead me to the area of the store with nothing but heels and sat me down.

"Here's your first pair" she said as she handed me a black pair with only like a three inch heel ( http://m.gojane.com/32055-shoes-patent-p... ). I think she was just starting me off easy. I put them on and had a hare time at first. It was kind of like walking on your toes. Once I started to get the hang of it, Megan handed me another pair. These ones were black, had a four inch heel ( http://m.gojane.com/85989-shoes-ankle-st... ) and a strap around the ankle. I think she gave me these so I wouldn't accidentally lose one. These were harder to walk in, but I eventually got the hang of it. Lastly, she handed me a black pair that looked like six inch heels ( http://m.gojane.com/88952-shoes-triple-l... ). "There only five and a half inches. I couldn't find and with six inches" Megan said. I put them on and struggled a lot at first because of the hight of the heels. I was walking while holding Megan's hand for ten minutes before I was conferrable enough to walk without her. And when I started walking on my own, I was walking very slow at first. But five minutes later, I was walking at a more normal speed.

Once I got the hang of it, I asked Megan "Can we leave now?" "Well, now pick some heels and we can go" she replied. "I'll take these then" I said motioning to the shoes on my feet. "I've gotten the hang of them and I kinda like how they look on me" I said. "Good for you, starting to be more like a girl already. Don't worry, I won't make you a total girl over night" Megan said.

After putting the running shoes I had wore here back on (they were the same ones that I was wearing when I first discovered I was Megan) and putting the heels in a bag with all the other shoes, we were just walking out of the store when the phone in my pocket started to ring. "When did you get a phone?" Megan asked me. "I picked up Stella's on the way out. I figured she would call it and I wanted to know if she was in my body" I answered the call and put it on speakerphone so Megan could talk as well. "Hello" I said. "Hello, who is this" the person on the other end said with my voice. "I'm Nick Donnelly, who is this?" "I'm Stella King. Right now I think I'm in your body and you don't sound like your in my body, so where is it" she said in a demanding tone. "I'm in Megan Browns body and she's in yours" I informed her. "That volleyball loser is in my body." Megan interrupted "I used to play softball, but I'm playing on the lacrosse team now" "Geez, your still a bitch. I don't even want my body back now that you've been in it. I'll keep this weak body. At least I can do something with it" Stella said just before hanging up. "I see what you mean" I said looking at Megan. "She sounds like a bitch." "Well, maybe she will eventually change with your body" Megan said trying to find a bright side to this. With that we went to a few clothing stores. We picked out a few things for me, mostly just teeshirts and loose fitting jeans. Then we headed back to Megan's house.
1353111211.title: Continue

13531112111.content:
Once we got home, we put everything away and made some dinner. I helped Megan make us some macaroni and cheese. I looked at the amount she gave me, when Megan said "You can't eat as much anymore. Start with this because you can have more if your still hungry". "You sound like my mother" I said jokingly. We took our dinners to the living room and watched a movie. It was some chick flick that I didn't really pay attention to.

When it was over I realized I was getting tired. "I think I'm going to bed now" I said.

"Ok, I'll get you some pajamas" Megan said. I followed her upstairs to her room. I waited in the doorway as she went over to a dresser, opened a drawer, and pulled out some pajama pants and a green shirt ( http://www.kohls.com/product/prd-1455415... ). "These should fit you" she said jokingly.

"I would hope so, I'm assuming that you've worn these recently" I said with a little giggle. 'Wow. I just giggled' I thought as I headed to the guest room.

I closed the door and slowly took of the shirt I was wearing. Just as I set it on the shirt on the floor, when Megan opened the door. "Hey Nick, I just wanted to tell you that, well, while your in my body, you don't have to feel like your violating me. It's not like you did this or anything. Just, keep your exploring to the surface. Ok" she said.

"I can do that" I said. With that Megan left. Not quite sure if I should be sleeping in the bra I was currently wearing, I just took it of and slid the green shirt that Megan gave me earlier. Then I slid out of the sweat pants I was wearing and slid into the pajama bottoms.

Sleeping was certainly a different experience. Having boobs meant I couldn't sleep on my stomach, and I kept accidentally bumping them with my arms. Let's just say, it was a restless night.

There is a screen not too far from you, behind the set of cameras pointed in your direction, on it you could see a woman laid out on an elegant sofa, in what appeared to be some elaborate bedroom set of some kind. It only took a moment to notice that the woman on the screen mimicked your every move. “That’s me … I’m her, what is going on?” you shouted, although it all came out in Spanish. The people behind the camera seemed completely oblivious to your shouts, many of them were grabbing at themselves, or running like they’d seen a ghost. You didn’t know what to do, suddenly you’d become an incredibly hot Latina, in the middle of a photoshoot, and every time you spoke Spanish came out instead of English. The whole stage seemed to devolve into pandemonium in mere moments, with people shouting at each other about stealing one another’s bodies and just screaming about some act of God.

Scared that you might get hurt in the madness you get off the couch you’d found yourself and try to head away from the set. You didn’t get very far before you tripped over the impressively tall high-heels your body had been wearing. 144212.content:
The studio doors slam shut behind you. You tottered out in this woman's preposterous heels to the parking lot and found that other people seemed out of sorts too. Lots of people in fact. A car ran into a telephone pole, sparks still trickling down from the cable lines dangling above. The car's radiator was spewing vapor and the burly man still sitting in the driver's seat was crying like a baby. Some people stopped to watch while others ran by, concerned about their own predicament.

Then you realized that you didn't know anything about this woman whose body you now possessed. She looked like a supermodel; her skin-tight dress, heels, and voluptuous figure attested to that. Her dress having built-in cups that pushed up her boobs and forming a mouth-watering valley of cleavage. It was a strappy, white dress that looked too small for this woman's waspish waist and hips. Well, now you were wearing that dress, and you could also feel the fabric of a thong wedged tight against your new bulbous butt.

"¿Quién soy? Recuerdo que durmiendo en clase, luego de repente estoy aquí. ¡Esta de la chingada! ¿Por qué todavía estoy hablando español?" You wailed. Your creamy, bolted-on tits rising and falling with every rushed breath you take. For some reason, this woman's brain was automatically translating your English thoughts into Spanish by the time they reached your lips.

You really had no choice but to head back into the studio if you wanted any hope of finding out who this woman is or where she lives. Putting two and two together, a woman looking like this wouldn't last long, alone, on the streets. Not especially during this crisis which seemed to affect so many people.

The studio had cleared out over the past 10 minutes. Camera crew abandoned their posts, lights and film tapes still running. Taking off her heels in favor of a pair of flip flops laying nearby, you then explore the receptionist desk, changing rooms, and back office for clues. Sadly, you couldn't make head or tails of all the junk laying around. Which bags belonged to whom?

Another woman in her early 20's, about the same age as your body perhaps, approached with a buzzing cell phone.

"Marisol, tu fono..." She said, placing it in your hands. Sighing, she added, "toda es desmadre afuera también... oye, has visto mi cuerpo? Soy Juanita."

You just shook your head, feeling Marisol's wavy locks swishing against the back of your neck. The bodyswapped young woman brushed past, leaving you to inspect the buzzing cell phone. Immediately you recognized the number as belonging to Nick Donnelly. Could it be the woman calling? Is she currently in your body at school, or is it someone else?

Marisol's heart beating furiously in your chest, you place the phone up to your ear and answer: "Hello? Do you know what's happening right now??"

Except that's not what you said. Instead, your panicked voice shrieked, "¿Hola? ¿Sabes lo que pasando ahorita?"

The voice on the line was definitely yours. But in a frustrating twist, you couldn't understand a single word it was saying! It was speaking quickly, so maybe you just didn't hear it right... even though nobody was left in the studio. People were talking outside and occasionally you heard a crash or bang from some unidentified source.

"Disculpe, no puedo entenderte. Habla más lento, por favor." You asked.

"... somehow we switched bodies. I'm having a hard time trying to understand you, but I know you must be scared." She said, although most of it was lost on you. "Looks like I'm in a school, so there must be a teacher who can speak Spanish around here. Can you hold for just a minute please?"

It sounded like she was asking you a question. Knowing that you should be able to understand English, yet utterly failing to grasp anything the other speaker was saying, you stammer, "Si, si, esa es mi cuerpo. Me llamo Nick Donnelly."

"Nick Donnelly, yeah I figured that out." She replied crossly. "I'm Marisol Rivera." So that was her name. The woman who switched bodies with you. It was still hard to believe that you were having a conversation with yourself... and struggling at that.

"I'm gonna stay on the line until I find someone who can help make it easier for us to communicate with each other." She explained, while you tried in vain to parse what she was saying. "It looks like whatever happened to us happened to almost everyone else too. All of a sudden, everyone in class was freaking out. I've never seen anything like it."

She continued to prattle away in English while you found a seat in a nearby dressing room. Locking the door, you put the phone on speaker mode, take a seat and stare slack-jawed at the beauty in the mirror. Gorgeous shoulder-length brown hair looked tussled and messy. Marisol's brown eyes blinked back at you, covered in a light coating of eye shadow. Her cheekbones were pronounced and her upturned nose looked small compared to her large, fleshy lips coated with a sleek, transparent gloss. Her arms were stick thin but her thighs were big and pushed out the hem of her dress. A dress which was a little too short and borderline slutty. Christ, what kind of a model is this woman?

Just then, you heard your voice pipe up. "You still there, Nick? I have some news I need to tell you..."

What does she say?

Nick was sitting in history class. He hated the class. Who wants to learn about some dumb war. It doesn't even matter. He was sitting at his desk,zoned out like usual, daydreaming when something weird happened. A sudden flash of white light hit him very hard. All of the sudden, he blacked out. He fell unconscious.

When he woke up, long, brown strands of hair got into his eyes. He looked around and he was in big, family style house. He was in what looked to be a living room. There was a big flat screen tv on the wall. He was laying on a big sofa couch instead of the deak he was sitting in earlier. "What the heck is going on" he thought to himself. His whole body felt completely different. His body weight seemed to have shifted. "This is getting weird." He thought. He struggled to sit up because of a mysterious weight on his stomach. He vaguely noticed a very large hump where his stomach should be. He pulled the blanket off of his lower body and was shocked at what he saw. He saw two enourmous, milk filled, GG cup boobs. Under them was a gigantic pregnant belly that was very hard and seemed heavy. "That's what has been holding me down" he thought not really taking the ramifications of the discovery. He struggled to get up with this new weight. He finally got up from the couch, noticing his center of gravity was all off. He nearly toppled over with the new weight on his stomach, butt, and chest. He waddled his new body over to a mirror and saw this http://www.writing.com/main/redirect.php...

He was now an extremely pregnant woman and from the accent in his voice he was now an australian woman. He waddled into a big kitchen, passing by a window with the view of a beach. Finding a purse, an id with the name Kim Tucci of Perth, Australia. "That must be the life I am now in." She said to herself. Also in the purse was a sonogram. " It looks like I am 29 weeks pregnant with quintuplets . I am pregnant with five babies. So that's why I'm as big as a house" she says in her new voice. Rubbing her gigantic belly instinctivly comes to her. Sitting down on the couch, rubbing her new pregnant belly, she thinks to herself,"How did I become an australian woman pregnant with quintuplets half way across the world." A nine year old boy and a 10 year old girl come in the back door of this house. They both came over to you on the couch. "Hey mommy, can we feel your belly. We want to see if we can feel the 5 babies. " they ask. You look at your right hand, which is now slender and feminine, and see a wedding ring on it. "These must be my other children" you think to yourself. "Sure you can feel my belly, but be very gentle with it. You guys don't want to hurt mommy and your prescious brothers and sisters." You say to the young children. They begin to rub your globe of a belly, putting their ears up to it trying to hear inside. Memories of your other marriage and that the nine year old boy was your child from another marriage. The 10 year old girl was your husbands kid from another marriage also. You felt 5 kicks in your stomach. You must be hungry. You remember that because of being pregnant with quintuplets, you have to eat 6,000 calories a day. "Man it seems is all this woman does is eat food. But I love carrying these 5 precious babies." Your biggest problem with this body is your limited mobility. You have to waddle where ever you go, you have to pee 12 times a day, and your belly makes sleeping impossible. No matter how many pillows you place it on. You can still feel the weight of your belly. "Man it is tough being pregnant. Especially with 5 babies." You think to yourself.

Financially, you are really rich. Your husband is a wealthy businessman. It makes being pregnant so much easier since you can stay home on bedrest. Later that night, Kim's new husband comes home with a bunch of food. "Hey honey, how are the babies treating you." He asked you while kissing you and putting his hands around your big belly. " I love your bldy when it is this big. I am going to make tonight upstairs really special if you catch my drift." He whispered to you. Everyone gathers around the table for dinner. "Here honey, I'll makr your plate, you really need to eat up. Per doctor's orders" he said. "I know honey, but I have already gained 105 pounds . Each baby weighs 4 pounds. I am now carrying 20 pounds of baby. I went from 125 pounds and now I weigh 230 pounds due to this pregnancy" you say.

What happens next?

"That can't be it,"I said, "Latasha can't fit in there."

"It seems like that's it, "said Rob.

I opened the small car's driver door and squeezed my enormous body into the seat. Once I was situated, I had to ask Rob to close the door for me because I could hardly move.

"Ok," I said, meaty hands on the wheel, "let's get out of here."

"Where are we going?" asked Rob.
15511.title: Latasha

That's when I realized my arm was different. I had short, stubby fingers and a complexion that looked Hispanic. I screamed, and realized that other people were screaming as well. I looked down at my body and saw two rather large, pointy breasts, and a nametag that said "María Rosa". I realized I was wearing a McDonald's uniform. Somehow I'd transformed into a McDonald's worker!

"Are you ok?" Asked a pimply teenager.

I opened my mouth, and...

1552.content:
...in the body of a sick girl.

It was probably the most jarring thing I have experienced in my life. One moment my head is on my desk, then in a literal bright flash I'm on the opposite side of the continent in a hospital ward, surrounded by beeping machines and hooked up to an IV. Apparently the girl I had ended up in had just finished a round of Chemo for leukemia and was recovering when it happened.

She got my body, I got hers, Thank god we were both sitting down and not doing anything risky, though I'm still pretty sure I got the short straw.
She was actually a pretty cute redhead, or would have been if most of her hair weren't falling out at the time. A highschool senior, 17, then everything goes wrong. Well, maybe not quite everything. Willow and I hang out online these days, but I'm getting ahead of myself. We're not there yet.

back to three months ago, when the switch happened...
1552.title: A Teenage Leukemia patient named Willow

For the most part, it had been a relatively slow and boring day. There was nothing exciting happening for a Friday, and to make matters worse for him his mom had gotten really sick this morning and asked me to take my younger sister to tonight's Ariana Grande concert a few towns over. In fact, the most interesting thing to happen today was me memorizing the rout to the concert. Either way, I was sitting in Mr. Franklands sophomore biology class listening to him go on about cell reproduction or something along those lines when I began to fall asleep. It wasn't a slow, drifting off feeling but rather a sudden out like a light feeling. In fact, everything went black.

The next thing I know, I'm waking up in the middle of a parking lot. As I sit up, my vision is blocked by long brown hair. As I brushed it out of my sight, I saw I now had two breasts contained in a white spaghetti strap tank top. On my legs, a pair of black sweatpants. On my feet, a pair of boots. In one hand, an iPhone. The other, some fruity drink from Starbucks. As I continued sitting there, I felt some keys in a pocket on my butt. I pulled them out and staired at them for a second, then at my surroundings. After a minute, I hit the alarm button on the keys and found the car they went to. As once I heard it I began walking in the alarms direction, but not before stoping to see just who I've become. Looking in the rear view mirror of a car, I was stunned to see the reflection of Ariana Grande starring back at me. I was speechless as I staired at her, with her reflection mimicking my every move. "Oh, my, God" I said, a little stunned by Ariana's voice coming from my lips. "Claire is gonna flip out". As I looked away from the car, I saw everyone was freaking out and screening about being in the wrong body. Realizing that I wasn't the only person like this, I quickly made my way to Ariana's car, a brand new 2015 and brand I didn't remember the name of, and smiled just a little ( http://www.hawtcelebs.com/wp-content/upl... ). I rushed to my house, but was hindered by the conditions of the street with accidents every 20 or 30 yards, and the fact that I wasn't 100% sure where I was. But after driving around for about 10 minutes I began recognizing landmarks and buildings and began to find my way home. Wanting to find some way to pass the time, I turned the radio on.

"For those of you just tuning in, the public is starting to call this event 'The Big Swap" said a male voice, "it has seemingly swapped bodies of the world population, and a whopping 95% of the world have found themselves in different bodies. At 10:43 this morning, the strange occurrence started in Belgium and made it's way around the rest of the world, hitting America at 10:45. A single island in the u.s. territories region has reported that not a single swap occurred on the island."

"Also" said a female voice, "world governments are frantically racing to find out who everyone has become, in order to get swapped individuals back to their loved ones. It has been confirmed that this is not the action of any known terrorist organization, and Belgian officials have not released any statements of strange sightings or activity within the country. I'm Brent Herkel, bringing you the real news."

"And I'm Kristine Johanson" said the male voice, "more details on this story as it emerges"

"And now, back to your music" the female voice said. After about 15 or 20 seconds of silence, one of Ariana Grande's new songs came on. I didn't know all the words, but I sang along with what I knew. I was really weird, having such an amazing singing voice for the first time in my life.

What happens next?
1553122221.title: Yup

15531222212.content:
Before you can even stop and think another moment, an unmarked van pulls up beside you and before you know it you're pulled out of the car and into the back of the van. A blonde woman who looks like she's had a rough day as she frantically begins to try to explain.

"Hey Ari, it's Rich your agent don't be alarmed!," the men begin to drive, taking left and right turns.
"Now I know this is all crazy, but we had to secure you to make sure you're safe. Now people need your music more than ever, and it's obvious that you weren't swapped, right?"

You think carefully about your response. If you say yes, you'd be forced to go on tour as Ariana Grande, sing her songs and basically be her. But, it would be for the betterment of hundreds, if not thousands if not MILLIONS of people affected by this "Big Switch." To where they could forget their problems even for a short time.
If you say no, you can maybe go back to your family, see what the damage has been done to your life personally and try to pick up the pieces from there as they try to figure out if it's reversible.

"Rich.."

You were sitting in Mrs. Livingston's class, learning something about Shakespeare. It was really boring. All of the sudden, you feel light headed and you seem to dip in and out of consciousness when you finally collapse on your desk and black out, falling unconscious.

You slowly wake up. You hear the sound of like pool water. You open your eyes and see a pool in front of you and you are now laying on a beach chair. Long black strands of hair fall in front of your eyes. You pish the strands of hair out of your wyes and notice your now smaller, tan, more feminine hand. "What the fuck! Where am I?" You think to yourself. You try and get up but cant due to a weird shift in your weight all to the front of your body. You finally look down and are shocked at what you find. You see two swollen, milk filled, tan, EE cup boobs barely contained in a grey snakeskin looking bikini top. Under those giant melons was a ginormous tan pregnant belly. You look behind you at your now huge backside. You recognize that backside from the magazine cover "This cant be. No I am not her." You think to yourself. You finally get up and feel somewhat balanced due to your huge ass in the back and huge boobs and belly in the front. You waddle over to a nearby mirror and the reflection confirms your terrible assumptions. You were now Kim Kardashian when she was pregnant.
[URL=http://s1175.photobucket.com/user/bfine2525/media/Pregnant/CC397B02-C75 3-4EEC-8E91-B0E66AFD03A9_zpsaegwh6eb.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1175.photobucket.com/albums/r625...[/IMG][/URL]
You waddle back over to the beach chair and felt a sudden kick. "Man Kim really did gain a lot of weight since she became pregnant. No wonder they have made fun of the weight gain. This belly is enormous." You think to yourself as you rub across the tan belly and Kim's memories slowly rush inside your head. Kim's mother shows up along with her sisters Khloe and Kourtney. They all sit down on the chairs next to you. "So how are you feeling Kim" Kris, Kim's mother asks you. "Well I hate being this fat. I mean I look like an elephant. I also ache due to the swelling." You say to them as you feel weird speaking in Kim's voice. "Well Kim, it will all be worth it in the end. You are just gonna have to deal with the weight gain right now." Her mother says to you. "And I cant stand to even go outside right now because of all the paparazzi making lies, saying that I gained 100+ pounds when I have not gained near that much weight." You again say as the rest of Kim's memories fill in your head.

"Have you found out what you are having?" Khloe asks as she puts a hand on your new pregnant belly. It feels weird to you that somebody wants to touch your pregnant belly and feel it. "We found out we are having a girl and are going to name her North." You say to them as you watch her touch and occasionaly rub your now pregnant belly, wanting her to stop. Your now mother joins in as she feels the belly.
You decided to stand a little bit in the pool. You waddle back into the beach house that you seem to be staying in for the weekend. You remember that Kanye isnt here this weekend because he is out working on a new album. To you, it seems kinda nice to escape your dull life for the life of a real celebrity even if it is a pregnant one. You try to escape Kims family for a few moments since they keep trying to touch your belly. Having to waddle everywhere because of the belly, not having a male extremity, and the constant kicks are just some of the weird feelings you are having to get used to pretty quick to completley act like kim and not your normal self. You waddle back out to the pool area after finishing going to the bathroom as Kim Kardashian for the first time. Kims family is still out there waiting to ask more pregnancy questions. "So Kim, how has it been in bed with kanye now with the pregnancy?" Kourtney asks you as you start to remember how to respond due to your new found memories. "Well it has been pretty rough. Since I have gained all of this weight, I just dont have any energy to anything. The belly also seems to get in the way as well." You say as you remember the experiences. "So how have the cravings been?" Kris asks you. "Well, look at me, I am huge! I can not stop eating. I have started eating a lot of junk food and have blown up like a blimp." You agitatingly say to them. "Let's talk about something other than my pregnant body." You finally say. They all quieted about your pregnancy and eventually head up to bed in their rooms after getting a few last touches to your belly.

You dry yourself off after going in the pool one last time. You waddle up the steps and head into the room that Kim seems to be staying in. You look through the huge wardrobe that Kim kept in the closet. You change into what looks like a night gown. You hear a cell phone ring and waddle around to look where it is. You finally discover it and answer it.
"Hello. who is this" you say to the person on the other end.
"Whoever this is in my body. I want it back." The person that sounded like your old voice said.
"Hey, I was just going by my everyday life as a 15 year old boy and all of the sudden and I am a pregnant celebrity. I had nothing to do with this. I just woke up in this body for some reason." You emphatically say to your old body.
"Well I was enjoying a time with my family to take my mind of having been 33 weeks pregnant. By the way, How is North doing?" you hear your old voice say.
"Well she seems to have been doing fine, she is kicking a lot now for some reason. It is starting to get on my nerves. I really would like to find a way to go back to my old life and to return you to your life as a celebrity." you say again in Kim's feminine voice.
"Okay, well have someone in the morning send my private jet to come pick me up so I can see my old body again and find a way to get our lives back to normal. Till I speak to you again, good night." you hear Kim tell you. You hang up and climb into the very luxurious bed. You schedule your private jet to pick up Kim in your old body tomorrow.

You wake up, thinking that for some reason this is all a very real and terrible nightmare. You open your eyes and see the same room that you fell asleep in. "Oh no, please I do not want to still be in the pregnant body of Kim Kardashian." you think to yourself as you see long black strands of hair fall in front of your eyes. You pull of the covers and what you see confirms your terrible assumptions. You are still in the body of Kim Kardashian and are still pregnant. You get up and put a hand on your pregnant belly. You waddle down to the steps to the kitchen where a tv camera is there, ready to film. They follow you around where you go and you learn that the old Kim is on her way to Los Angeles to meet with you on her/your private jet. You have the private chef fix you up a pretty nice breakfast to calm the baby in your belly.

What happens next?

155321221.content:
That Friday had started just like any other had my whole life. I got up, got ready, ate breakfast, went to school. Then it happened. I was in my 3rd hour class, when suddenly I blacked out. When I came to, I was in a school hallway. And it wasn't a hallway I recognized. I looked around, but I didn't see any other students. 'Umm, what's going on'.

Suddenly I felt a tickle on the back of my neck. I reached back and grabbed some long, blond hair that reached the bottom of my shoulder blades, done up in a single ponytail. As I continued to look at the hair attached to my head, I noticed I was wearing a light blue Nike tee shirt with a lime green sports bra underneath. Contained in the bra were a good sized pair of breasts. Looking past the breasts, I saw that on my legs were a pair very short, worn, jean shorts, with a red white and blue belt around the waist. Underneath the shorts were a pair of long, legs with a definite feminine shape. On the feet that I was looking at was a pair of nikes with light blue shoes, with lime green accents. Then I noticed a bright green backpack laying on the floor next to where I was sitting ( http://www.pintrest.com/pin/239183401815... ). I picked the bag up and started to dig through it. After a moment, I found a small, handheld mirror. Looking at the reflection, I was suddenly shocked when I saw my cousin, Sarah.

Sara is what most people call her, popular. She is around 5 foot, 10 inches tall and maybe 135 lbs. She is a star on her schools Volleyball team and Softball team, getting full ride scholarships to schools for one or the other, and some schools were giving her to do both. But for living in Florida her whole life, she's never been able to get a good tan. She says it's the Canadian blood from our grandparents, but I personally think she never tries that hard. Anyway...

"Oh, my, God" I said, instantly covering my mouth with the smaller hand due to the sound of my 17 year old cousins voice escaping my throat. Quickly, I picked up all my cousins things that I could find on the floor and headed out the nearest door (which happened to be the front door). While it was starting to get colder out back where I lived, my cousins family lived in a small town about two hours northeast of Miami, Florida. AND, she and her family lived across the street from Sarah's school. I quickly crossed the street and made my way up to the front door. As I guessed, it was locked. I set Sara's backpack in the ground and began looking for a set of keys, luckily finding them in the first pocket of the backpack I looked in. I unlocked the door and removed Sarah's shoes and left them with the rest of her family's shoes that were still in the house.

"What to do now" I said to myself. Then I looked down at he clothes I had found myself in. "well, I guess I could find something more comfortable to wear"

With that, I headed upstairs to Sarah's room. While I'd stayed in the house before when we'd visit, in never been aloud into Sarah's room before. I opened the door, slowly, carefully, as if something could pop out from behind it and attack me. Nothing did. And when I opened the door fully, I got a good look at Sarah's room. The floor was covered with clothes. 'Must have been looking for something in particular' I thought to myself.

I had been kinda focused with trying to find something else to wear, I hadn't heard the front door open and close, or someone come upstairs and walk into the room. "Umm, Sandra?" she asked.

"No" I said. "My name is Nick. Somehow I blacked out and ended up in my cousins body"

"Nick. Oh my god, it's me. Sarah"

"Sarah" I said, stunned. I was looking at a girl with a good tan (obvious considering this girl probably lived in Florida her whole life). She had long, dark brown hair that came down to her stomach. She was currently wearing a pair of black running tights, and a blue long sleeved shirt with a pink Nike logo on the chest. She didn't at this moment have any shoes on, but she was wearing a pair of all white cotton ankle socks. She was roughly the same height as me, maybe an inch or two shorter ( http://www.pintrest.com/pin/239183430181... ). "I thought you'd have been in my body"

"I thought someone else was going to be in mine" she replied. "So, what were you doing in here?"

"Well, when I realized I was in your body I came here. But I was hoping to find something more comfortable than these to wear"

"How about some help then" Sarah said.

"I'd like that"

"Ok, but I have some conditions you'll need to follow" she said.

"Name it"

"You dress how I tell you, keep my body, which your in, in good shape, "

"Why" I asked.

"Because, if we change back, I don't want my body outta shape"

"Makes sense" I replied.

"Good, now let's see what you'll be comfortable in" she said as she looked through her closet. Pulling some clothes out, she handed them to me and said "here you go"

I looked at that she was handing me, a black nike tee shirt that said in pink lettering 'I'm on it' and a pair of dark blue skinny jeans ( www.polyvore.com/lalalalala_life_is_easy_jk/set?id=53148813 ). "Those should fit you" she said to me.

Smiling, I said "I hope so". I proceeded to to begin changing while Sarah also found something else and changed. She also taught me the best way to put on and take off a bra so she wouldn't need her help in the future.

We spent most of the day watching the news and waiting for my aunt and uncle to come home. They eventually did, but my Uncle Dan ended up in he body of a cheerleader from the local college (we know that because she had a cheerleader uniform on when she swapped with him) and my Aunt Betty was swapped into the body of a male intern at her office. Both of them were roughly around 22 or 23 years old.

We really didn't do much that night, we ate macaroni and cheese for dinner and everyone went to bed around 9:30, with me having to sleep on the couch because the guest room was filled with "random junk" as my uncle turned aunt described it. Sarah gave me a set of pajamas to use until I was able to go home.

I spent most of the night on my uncles iPad, sending Facebook messages to my friends. Eventually, my best friend Jimmy answered my message. He ended up in the body of his 7 year old sister. I told him how I'd send him a photo of my new body in the morning, then fell asleep around 10:30.
155321221.title: A different school in a different state

info.description:
UPDATE: IF YOU ADD A CHAPTER, I WILL CONTINUE ONE OF THE OPTIONS IF THERE ARE ANY

Your name, well, what used to be your name, is Nick Donnelly. You are an average fifteen year old kid. One day, out of nowhere, the world ends. Well, not really. But everyone switched bodies. That's right. 95% of the world's population simultaneously swap bodies.

Main Characters: these characters will appear in most threads
Nick (you)
Claire, your sister, 14, girly girl
Tyler, 15, your best friend, funniest kid in school
Zoey, 15, your other friend, tomboy
Mike, 16, school bully
Willow, 15, popular girl
Carol, 47, your mom
Peter, 15, nerd

Rules:
Death is ok.
Don't make Nick an asshole
Proper grammar
